data.message: On 17 th october 1972 A legend was born!  A man who changed the whole world with his lyrics!His father left him when he was 2 month older His mother was a drugs addict, so she never loved him but still he apologize her mom He lost his uncle (the nearest person to him)He lost his best friendPeople was opposing his lyrics because of his skin colorHis wife him left but he adopted her sister!He's top selling artist of the decade remember he miss 5 years because of his drugs addiction And you know who is he?ans I am proud of being his fan
